todos.title: Rubbing Elbows
todos.body: The understand the value of association.

todos.title: More Than Their Gifts
todos.body: Know its not about what you are given in life but your mental, spiritual, and emotional attitude.

todos.title: Surround Themselves
todos.body: With people smarter and better than themselves.

todos.title: Inner Fire
todos.body: Use adversity as fuel.  They make no excuses.

todos.title: What Off-Season
todos.body: Thy are always working towards the next game.

todos.title: The Ultimate Teamate
todos.body: They will assume whatever role necessary to win.

todos.title: Visualize Victory
todos.body: They see victory before the game begins.

todos.title: When No One is Watching
todos.body: They live life with integrity.

todos.title: When all else fails
todos.body: They know how and when to adjust the game plan.

todos.title: Do Unto Others
todos.body: They know character is defined by how they treat those who cannot help them.

todos.title: Believe
todos.body: They have faith in a higher power.

todos.title: When Everyone is Watching
todos.body: They embrace the idea of being a role model.

todos.title: Not just about Benjamins
todos.body: They don’t play just for the money.

todos.title: Common Things
todos.body: They do common things uncommonly well.

todos.title: Better not Bitter
todos.body: They choose to be better, not bitter in adversity.

todos.title: Records are made to be broken
todos.body: They are well-rounded and know that their legacy isn’t the work they’ve done.

todos.title: Contagious Enthusiasm
todos.body: They are positive thinkers.  They are enthusiastic and that enthusiasm rubs off.

todos.title: Ice in their Veins
todos.body: The are thoughtful risk takers and don’t fear mistakes.

todos.title: Sell Through Listening and Stories
todos.body: Know how to tell a good story and know that a story isn’t linear.  Show person the path but they jump around as they explain it.

todos.title: It’s Personal
todos.body: Great people hate to lose more than they love to win.

todos.title: Block Time
todos.body: For personal development.

todos.title: Hope For Best
todos.body: But they prepare for the worst.
